home.how_text: We believe meaningful trips begin with genuine connections. We take the time to understand each client's interests and rely on well-established local partnerships to craft private, carefully tailored itineraries with a simple and personalized process.

steps.step1_text: Explore our options and choose the perfect one for your trip. Each experience is designed for you to enjoy—combining relaxation, culture, and adventure so you can experience the city your own way.
steps.step2_text: When you find the right experience, message us on WhatsApp or Instagram. We’ll connect you directly with the hosts and coordinate all the details for you.
steps.step3_text: On the day of your experience, all you need to do is enjoy. Each activity is run by professionals who love what they do and want to share their passion with you.

home.final_section_text: At Royal Stay we know what to do, where to do it, and—most importantly—when to do it. We design everything for those seeking authenticity and quality.

about.title: BEHIND ROYAL STAY
about.paragraph: We are Matias and Angie, a couple who have been building our business in Buenos Aires for years with a clear mission: to offer travelers experiences and products that are truly worthwhile. We know every corner, every flavor, and every experience worth living. That's why we personally try and select everything we recommend: from an initial list of 12 options, we choose only the top 3 in each category. We want you to enjoy the best of the best: experiences you'll remember, flavors that will stay with you, and moments you'll want to recommend.
